name: Aigis
description: Aigis is first available on January 8th on Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday and after the 25th all school days.
ranks: Rank 6: No, you didn't/He saw me as a boyfriend
Rank 8: I'm doing it now > Anything
unlocks: For completing this social link you are able to fuse Metatron through Cross fusion using Michael, Gabriel, Uriel and Raphael. AKA the Four Archangels.
